description: Critical analysis of current research in information systems. Review of principle perspectives in the current IS literature. Development of analytical capabilities in regard to modern IS research.
prerequisites: 2 units of BISM/MGTS course + permission from Head of School
restricted:
BAdvBus(Hons), BCom(Hons), BAdvFinEcon(Hons), BInfTech(Hons), GCBusRMeth, GDipBRM, MCom, PhD, MPhil.
Quota: Minimum of 10 enrolments
